library(tidyverse)

player <- read.csv("players.csv")
plays <- read.csv("plays.csv")

third_and_long <- plays %>%
  filter(down == 3 & yardsToGo > 7)

w1 <- read.csv("week1.csv")
w1 <- w1 %>%
  filter(event == "ball_snap")

week1tal <- left_join(third_and_long, w1, by = c("playId", "gameId"))
